p: Molecular docking studies were made by Molecular-Operating Environment (MOE-2016.08) (Munir et al., 2020). Docking study for α-glucosidase enzyme was performed on our previously reported homology modeled α-glucosidase (Ali et al., 2018). Preparation of ligand's downloaded enzymes such as determination of binding sites, energy minimization and 3-D protonation was performed by previously reported methods (Iftikhar et al., 2018; Ullah et al., 2018; Tanoli et al., 2019). Docking results were interpreted, and their surfaces were analyzed with graphical representation utilizing discovery-studio visualizer (Biovia, 2017).
